history.title: About Caesars Windsor
history.description2: Caesars Windsor is a modern hotel and casino located on the riverfront in Windsor, Ontario. The resort features comfortable rooms, diverse dining options, and vibrant entertainment. The casino offers slot machines, table games, and a poker room. Guests enjoy live shows, spa treatments, and nightlife. A loyalty program rewards active players with bonuses and perks.
history.description3: Caesars Windsor is especially popular with U.S. visitors thanks to its convenient location and appealing benefits.

customHtml.title: Caesars Windsor: a premier riverfront casino resort
customHtml.description:
Caesars Windsor stands as a flagship casino resort in Windsor, Ontario, set right on the scenic riverfront across from Detroit. Travelers come for the blend of an elegant hotel, a high‑energy casino floor, and a robust calendar of entertainment that turns a simple getaway into a standout experience. Contemporary design and the signature Caesars aesthetic set the stage, while attentive, premium service anchors the stay from check‑in to check‑out.


The accommodation mix is designed for every kind of trip, from business overnights to long weekends and celebratory escapes with friends. Spacious rooms and suites deliver restful beds, thoughtful lighting, and sweeping river or skyline views, so the room itself becomes part of the destination. Proximity to the casino, entertainment venues, and wellness areas adds everyday convenience, and guests wind down in the indoor pool, sauna, and a well‑equipped fitness center between gaming sessions and night‑time plans.


The casino floor is the resort’s pulse and one of the region’s most recognizable gaming destinations. Expect a deep lineup of slot machines, classic table games, and a dedicated poker environment balanced with comfortable lounges and clear wayfinding. A focused area for sports wagering pairs high‑definition screens with easy bet placement, turning game day into a social occasion. The ambiance throughout is unmistakably Caesars, combining refined finishes with player‑first ergonomics.


Dining at Caesars Windsor covers the spectrum from refined to relaxed. Signature venues plate premium steaks, Mediterranean and Italian favorites, and polished desserts, while casual concepts make it easy to grab a bite between a show and a session at the tables. Bars are strategically placed across the resort, ranging from cocktail‑forward lounges to sports-centric spaces with live broadcasts, and nightlife zones keep energy high with resident DJs and live sets. Whether you are toasting a win or easing into the evening, there is always a spot that matches the mood.


Headlining entertainment takes the spotlight at The Colosseum, a marquee venue welcoming touring musicians, comedians, and specialty productions. Many guests plan visits around these performances, and the venue’s calendar blends genres to keep the lineup fresh. Away from the stage and the tables, guests fill their time with spa treatments, boutique shopping, and photo‑worthy riverfront walks that frame the Detroit skyline. The result is a resort that appeals to gamers and non‑gamers alike, delivering a well‑rounded urban escape in a single address.


Bonuses and loyalty play a central role in the guest journey. Through Caesars Rewards, visitors earn credits across gaming, stays, dining, and shopping, unlocking meaningful perks, status tiers, and exclusive offers over time. Regular casino promotions add momentum to the action, while the broader Caesars network lets members enjoy benefits beyond Windsor. Personalized deals, preferred room pricing, and on‑property privileges help frequent guests get more from every visit.


For meetings, weddings, and private celebrations, the resort provides flexible venues, professional planning support, and modern production capabilities. From intimate gatherings to large conferences and post‑show parties, Caesars Windsor combines the prestige of a marquee address with practical event logistics. Its river-border location and access to major transport routes make it especially convenient for regional and cross‑border attendees.


Caesars Windsor Visitor Rules

To enter Caesars Windsor Casino, guests must be 19 years or older and present valid photo ID. There is no entry fee, and the casino operates 24/7, including holidays.

Dress code

The dress code is smart casual or resort casual, meaning neat, clean, and appropriate attire. Men are encouraged to wear collared shirts, dress pants or clean jeans, and closed-toe shoes. Women may wear dresses, skirts, blouses, and elegant footwear. Prohibited items include sports jerseys, ripped clothing, sweatpants, flip-flops, beachwear, and non-religious headwear.

VIP areas, fine dining venues, and the ARIIUS nightclub enforce a stricter dress code: no hoodies, ball caps, construction boots, baggy jeans or jackets. Guests are expected to “dress to impress.”

Security

Security protocols apply at The Colosseum concert venue, including metal detectors and bag checks. Bags must be under 8×11 inches; large backpacks, outside food/drinks, weapons, and cameras are not allowed. Non-compliance may result in denied entry without refund.


Caesars Rewards Loyalty Program at Caesars Windsor

Caesars Rewards is one of the largest and most rewarding casino loyalty programs, offering players bonuses, perks, and exclusive offers for engaging with the resort.


Key features of the program:

  • • 6 tier levels: Gold, Platinum, Diamond, Diamond Plus, Diamond Elite, and Seven Stars®. Tier upgrades depend on points earned over a 12-month period.
  • • Entry level — Gold: available upon registration.
  • • Points are earned through: slot and video poker play, hotel stays, dining, shopping, and attending events.
  • • Rewards include: free hotel nights, dining discounts, show tickets, gifts, cashback, and lounge access.
  • • VIP benefits: priority check-in, free valet parking, birthday dinners, and invitations to exclusive events.
  • • Points are valid across all Caesars properties: including Las Vegas, Atlantic City, and more.

To get started, simply visit the Caesars Rewards Center at the casino, register with a valid ID, and use your card every time you play or spend.

customHtml_2.title: Entertainment & Leisure at Caesars Windsor Casino
customHtml_2.description:
Bonuses, Promotions & Entertainment at Caesars Windsor

Caesars Windsor offers a wide range of exciting promotions and seasonal events that go beyond the loyalty program, making every visit more rewarding and fun.


Gaming Bonuses and Promotions

  • • Drops & Wins — monthly tournaments with chances to win cash prizes, free spins, and gifts.
  • • Deposit Bonuses — up to 400% on initial deposits, including free spins and loyalty points.
  • • Gift Cards & Bonus Credits — awarded during weekly and holiday promotions.
  • • Cash Draws — seasonal prize pools, such as up to C$50,000 in cash giveaways.

Seasonal Events and Prize Draws

  • • Play Ontario Giveaway — weekly draws featuring lottery tickets, slot bonuses, gift cards, and cash.
  • • Grand Prizes — chances to win cars (e.g., Dodge Charger) and large cash awards.
  • • Holiday Promotions — themed events and giveaways for Halloween, Christmas, New Year’s, and more.

Entertainment and Shows

  • • The Colosseum — a 5,000-seat venue hosting concerts, comedy acts, and theatrical performances.
  • • Ariius Nightclub — a stylish space for dancing, cocktails, and DJ sets.
  • • Live Music & Theme Nights — featured in bars and lounges throughout the resort.

Special Offers in Bars and Restaurants

  • • Happy Hours — discounted drinks and snacks during select hours.
  • • Signature Cocktails & Tastings — seasonal menus and wine pairing events.
  • • Holiday Dinners — special menus for Thanksgiving, Christmas, and other festive occasions.

Popular Games at Caesars Windsor

Caesars Windsor features over 2,000 slot machines, 85 table games, a dedicated poker room, and a full-service sportsbook, making it one of Canada’s most diverse gaming destinations.


Slot Machines

  • • Popular titles include Buffalo Gold, Lightning Link, Cleopatra, Mega Moolah, and Starburst.
  • • Classic slots offer retro-style gameplay with fruit symbols and simple mechanics.
  • • Video slots feature bonus rounds, free spins, and multipliers.
  • • Jackpot slots provide chances to win big through progressive prize pools.

Table Games

  • • Blackjack — including Blazing 7’s Progressive Blackjack.
  • • Roulette — both classic and electronic formats.
  • • Craps — with betting limits up to C$50,000.
  • • Baccarat — including Royal 9 Progressive Baccarat.
  • • Pai Gow Poker, Caribbean Stud, Let It Ride, Three Card Poker, Four Card Poker — for poker enthusiasts.

Poker Room

  • • 14 tables with live dealers.
  • • Weekly tournaments every Friday and Sunday.
  • • World Series of Poker satellite events.
  • • High betting limits — among the highest in the Detroit–Ontario region.

Sportsbook

  • • Caesars Sportsbook — 1,700 sq. ft. with 22 large screens and 24/7 betting kiosks.
  • • Bet on major sports including football, hockey, basketball, tennis, and more.

Minimum and Maximum Bets at Caesars Windsor

Caesars Windsor Casino offers flexible betting limits suitable for both casual players and high rollers. Limits may vary depending on time of day and crowd levels, especially on weekends and during special events.


Game Type Minimum Bet Maximum Bet
Slot Machines C$0.01 Up to C$100
Video Poker C$0.25 Up to C$50
Blackjack C$5–C$25 Up to C$25,000
Roulette C$2–C$15 Up to C$50,000
Craps C$15–C$25 Up to C$50,000
Baccarat C$15 Up to C$15,000
Pai Gow Poker C$15 Up to C$15,000
Poker (cash games) C$3–C$6 (limit) Up to C$500 (no-limit)
Sports Betting C$2 Depends on event

Events and Entertainment at Caesars Windsor

Caesars Windsor is more than a casino — it’s a premier entertainment destination in Ontario. The centerpiece is The Colosseum, a 5,000-seat theatre hosting concerts, comedy shows, touring productions, and seasonal spectacles.


Special Events and Shows

  • • Live concerts by top artists: performances by Sarah McLachlan, Bryan Adams, Il Divo, Our Lady Peace, Shawn Desman, The Tenors, Matthew Good, Finger Eleven, The Tea Party, Kasador, and more.
  • • Comedy acts: regular shows by famous comedians like Jo Koy, Sebastian Maniscalco, Andrew Santino, Russell Peters, Gerry Dee, and Hannah Berner.
  • • Seasonal productions: such as Holiday Dreams, a holiday-themed circus show with acrobatics and visual effects.
  • • Tribute performances: Voyage (Journey tribute), The Man In Black (Johnny Cash tribute).
  • • Themed nights: Wheel of Fortune Live, holiday parties, and DJ sets at Ariius nightclub.

Ariius Nightclub

Ariius Nightclub, located inside Caesars Windsor, is one of Canada’s most upscale and expansive nightlife venues. It offers a Las Vegas–style experience with high-end design, elite service, and unforgettable entertainment.


Spanning over 10,000 square feet, the club features 3 bars, 30 private VIP areas, a LED ceiling over the dance floor, a 16-foot LED screen behind the DJ booth, and a 100,000-watt sound system. The interior is lavishly designed with high ceilings, plush furnishings, a women’s lounge, and powder room, creating a glamorous and comfortable setting.


Additional Entertainment

  • • Live music in bars — themed evenings, local bands, and lounge performances.
  • • Holiday events — Halloween, Christmas, and New Year’s celebrations with shows, giveaways, and special dining menus.

Relaxation, Bars & Dining at Caesars Windsor

Caesars Windsor is more than a casino — it’s a full-service resort offering gaming, fine dining, luxury accommodations, and vibrant nightlife. The hotel features 758 rooms across two towers — Forum Tower (adults only) and Augustus Tower (family-friendly). Rooms include HDTVs, coffee makers, safes, refrigerators, and views of the Detroit River or Windsor skyline.


Hotel & Relaxation

  • • Indoor Pool & Whirlpool — year-round swimming with river views.
  • • Fitness Center & Sauna — modern equipment and wellness space.
  • • Spa Services — massages, facials, manicures, pedicures, waxing. [wyndhamhotels.com]
  • • Shopping — Caesars Essentials gift shop and Landau Boutique.
  • • Business Center & Meeting Rooms — ideal for conferences and weddings.

Restaurants

  • • Neros Steakhouse — upscale steaks, wine, and elegant ambiance.
  • • Spago Italian Eatery — pasta, pizza, and Italian desserts.
  • • Legends Sports Bar — live sports, snacks, and beer.
  • • Café 377 — light meals and coffee.
  • • Johnny Rockets — classic American burgers and milkshakes.
  • • Tim Hortons — quick Canadian coffee and snacks.

Bars & Nightlife

  • • Ariius Nightclub — Vegas-style club with DJs and cocktails.
  • • Bacchus Bar — cozy bar with tabletop games and drinks.
  • • Cosmos Lounge — live music on weekends and lounge vibes.
  • • The House Sports Lounge — sports on big screens and draft beer.
  • • VU Bar — stunning Detroit skyline views and cocktails.

items.title: How do I register at Caesars Windsor?
items.answer: Visit the Caesars Rewards desk with valid photo ID to sign up.

items.title: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: Cash, credit/debit cards, and Caesars Rewards credits.

items.title: What language is used at the casino?
items.answer: English is primary. Staff may assist in French and other languages.

items.title: Are drinks free while playing?
items.answer: Yes, complimentary non-alcoholic drinks are available to players.

items.title: Can I pay for my stay with reward points?
items.answer: Yes, Reward Credits can be used for rooms and services.
